Yi Lin is now a researcher in Jarvis Lab at Tencent under the supervision of Dr. Yefeng Zheng. He received his M.S. degree and B.S. degree from Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST) in 2020 and 2012 respectively, under the supervision of Prof. Xin Yang. His research interests include medical image analysis and deep learning.
